nodes.text: Parents– Protect Your Kids From Worms

Parents– Protect Your Kids From Worms was an Imperial propaganda poster created by 13 BBY. It depicted Proxima's face, with the words "Parents– Protect Your Kids From Worms" above it, and the words "Sign Them up for the Imperial Navy" below it. The poster was written in High Galactic alphabet and was eventually collected in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.
Parents– Protect Your Kids From Worms was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
